CustomField.description: Total Margin Amount divided by Total Sale, Operations, Carry On Sale and Sublease Amounts
CustomField.formula: Total_Margin_Amount__c / (Total_Sale_Contract_Value__c + Total_Operations_Contract_Value__c + Total_SubRental_Contract_Value__c + IF( TEXT(Transaction_Type__c) = "Sale", Total_Carry_On_Contract_Value__c , 0) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Margin Amount divided by Total Sale, Operations, Carry On Sale and Sublease Amounts
CustomField.label: Total Margin %
